meanings.definition: A Roman military unit consisting of ten soldiers.

meanings.definition: A Roman unit of currency equal to ten asses.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Rome, merchants exchanged goods for decuries of coins.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy citizen possessed a decuries of valuable coins.
